detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.fallback() (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#34-71):
	External calls:
	- tokenFree = sharesTokenAddress.balanceOf(this) (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#35)
	- sharesTokenAddress.transfer(msg.sender,tokenFree) (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#62)
	External calls sending eth:
	- owner.transfer(sendETH) (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#61)
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - sendETH) (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#63)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleClosed = true (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#66)
	Crowdsale.crowdsaleClosed (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#20) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Crowdsale.crowdsaleClosed (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#20)
	- Crowdsale.fallback() (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#34-71)
	- Crowdsale.unsoldTokensBack() (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#73-78)
	- tokenFree = 0 (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#65)
	Crowdsale.tokenFree (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#19) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Crowdsale.fallback() (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#34-71)
	- Crowdsale.tokenFree (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#19)
	- Crowdsale.unsoldTokensBack() (0x6cd171ef32b2ffa2b54481bea9d72692cd44f053.sol#73-78)

	- ECRecoverMalformedInput.
